trans-unit.source: Serializes and deserializes object graphs that represent the state of an object.
trans-unit.target: Serializes og deserializes diagrammer for objektet som representerer tilstanden til et objekt.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectStateFormatter class serializes and deserializes object state graphs in a compact format.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ObjectStateFormatter serializes og deserializes objektet tilstand diagrammer i et kompakt format.

trans-unit.source: ObjectStateFormatter is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class and classes that derive from it to serialize view state and control state.
trans-unit.target: ObjectStateFormatter brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>klassen og klasser som er avledet fra den til å serialisere visningsstatus og kontrollere tilstand.</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: It is also used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.LosFormatter> class to provide object state graph formatting for various parts of the ASP.NET infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Den brukes også av den <xref:System.Web.UI.LosFormatter>klassen for å angi objektet tilstand diagrammet formatering for ulike delene av ASP.NET-infrastruktur.</xref:System.Web.UI.LosFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The ObjectStateFormatter class is optimized to serialize and format many common .NET Framework reference types, as well as constants.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ObjectStateFormatter er optimalisert for å serialisere og formatere mange vanlige referansetyper for .NET Framework, i tillegg konstanter.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the types that are optimized.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser typene som er optimalisert.

trans-unit.source: ||||| |-|-|-|-| |<xref:System.Array>|<xref:System.DateTime>|<xref:System.Int16>|<xref:System.String>| |<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>|<xref:System.Double>|<xref:System.Int32>|String []| |<xref:System.Boolean>|<xref:System.Enum>|null (`Nothing`)|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Byte>|<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>|<xref:System.Web.UI.Pair>|<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>| |<xref:System.Char>|<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary>|<xref:System.Single>|<xref:System.Type>| |<xref:System.Drawing.Color>|<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>||| Additionally, while conventional string types and string arrays are written to and from a serialized binary writer unaltered, some strings are optimized by creating internal string tables.
trans-unit.target: ||||| |-|-|-|-| | <xref:System.Array>| <xref:System.DateTime>| <xref:System.Int16>| <xref:System.String>| | <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>| <xref:System.Double>| <xref:System.Int32>| Streng [] | | <xref:System.Boolean>| <xref:System.Enum>|null (`Nothing`)|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Byte>| <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>| <xref:System.Web.UI.Pair>| <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>| | <xref:System.Char>| <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary>| <xref:System.Single>| <xref:System.Type>| | <xref:System.Drawing.Color>| <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>||| I tillegg mens konvensjonelt strengtyper og streng matriser er skrevet til og fra serialiserte binære Forfatter uendret, noen strenger er optimalisert ved å opprette interne strengen tabeller.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary> </xref:System.Char> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Pair> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Enum> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Strings are optimized using these tables if the string has an associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object or if the string is actually an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IndexedString> class.
trans-unit.target: Strenger er optimalisert ved hjelp av disse tabellene Hvis strengen har en tilknyttet <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>-objekt, eller hvis strengen er egentlig en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.IndexedString>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.IndexedString> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Other types not listed above are binary-serialized using a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> object if they implement the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface or are decorated with the <xref:System.SerializableAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Andre typer som ikke er oppført ovenfor er binary-serialisert ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>objekt hvis de implementere den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>grensesnitt eller dekorert med den <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>attributtet.</xref:System.SerializableAttribute> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The ObjectStateFormatter class is not optimized for any of these serializable types.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ObjectStateFormatter er ikke optimalisert for noen av disse serialiserbare typer.

trans-unit.source: If the ObjectStateFormatter class encounters a type that is not serializable, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis klassen ObjectStateFormatter støter på en type som ikke kan serialiseres, en <xref:System.ArgumentException>unntak.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Deserializes an object state graph from its binary-serialized form that is contained in the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: Deserializes diagrammet en objekt-tilstand fra sin serialisert binær form som ligger i den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Any object state graph that is serialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A> method can be deserialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Objektet tilstand diagrammer som er serialisert med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A>metoden kan deserialiseres med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Deserialize method is used to restore an object state graph stored in a <xref:System.IO.Stream>, such as a <xref:System.IO.FileStream>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Deserialize brukes til å gjenopprette en objektet tilstand diagrammet lagret i en <xref:System.IO.Stream>, for eksempel <xref:System.IO.FileStream>.</xref:System.IO.FileStream> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Kalle denne metoden med uklarerte data er en sikkerhetsrisiko.

trans-unit.source: Call this method only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden bare med klarert data.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [uklarerte Data sikkerhetsrisiko](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter"></xref> deserializes into an initialized <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter"> </xref> deserializes til en initialisert <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a deserialized object state graph.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer et deserialisert objekt tilstand diagram.

trans-unit.source: The specified inputStream is .
trans-unit.target: The specified inputStream is .

trans-unit.source: An exception occurs during deserialization of the <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstår et unntak under deserialisering av <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The exception message is appended to the message of the <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Unntaksmeldingen føyes til meldingen for <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: Deserializes an object state graph from its serialized base64-encoded string form.
trans-unit.target: Deserializes et objekt tilstanden diagrammet fra den serialiserte base64-kodede strengen-formen.

trans-unit.source: Any object state graph that is serialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A> method can be deserialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Objektet tilstand diagrammer som er serialisert med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A>metoden kan deserialiseres med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Deserialize method is used to restore an object state graph stored in base64-encoded string form.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Deserialize brukes til å gjenopprette en objektet tilstand diagrammet lagret i formatet base64-kodet streng.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Kalle denne metoden med uklarerte data er en sikkerhetsrisiko.

trans-unit.source: Call this method only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden bare med klarert data.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [uklarerte Data sikkerhetsrisiko](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

trans-unit.source: A string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter"></xref> deserializes into an initialized object.
trans-unit.target: En streng som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter"> </xref> deserializes til et initialisert objekt.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a deserialized object state graph.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer et deserialisert objekt tilstand diagram.

trans-unit.source: The specified inputString is or has a of 0.
trans-unit.target: The specified inputString is or has a of 0.

trans-unit.source: The serialized data is invalid.
trans-unit.target: De serialiserte dataene er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: The machine authentication code (MAC) validation check that is performed when deserializing view state fails.
trans-unit.target: Maskinen godkjenning koden (MAC) valideringskontrollen som er utført under deserialisering av visningsstatus mislykkes.

trans-unit.source: Serializes an object state graph to a base64-encoded string.
trans-unit.target: Serializes et objekt tilstanden diagrammet til en base64-kodet streng.

trans-unit.source: Any object graph that is serialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A> method can be deserialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Objektet diagrammer som er serialisert med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A>metoden kan deserialiseres med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Serialize method is used to serialize an object state graph to a base64-encoded string form.
trans-unit.target: Metoden serialisert brukes til å serialisere et objekt tilstanden diagrammet til et base64-kodede strengen-skjema.

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å serialisere.

trans-unit.source: A base-64 encoded string that represents the serialized object state of the stateGraph parameter.
trans-unit.target: En Base64-kodet streng som representerer den serialiserte objekt tilstanden til den stateGraph parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Serializes an object state graph to the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: Serializes et objekt tilstanden diagrammet til den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Any object state graph that is serialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A> method can be deserialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Objektet tilstand diagrammer som er serialisert med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A>metoden kan deserialiseres med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Serialize method is used to serialize an object state graph to a binary <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden serialisert brukes til å serialisere et objekt tilstanden diagrammet til en binær <xref:System.IO.Stream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter"></xref> serializes the state of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter"> </xref> serializes tilstanden for det angitte objektet.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å serialisere.

trans-unit.source: The specified inputStream is .
trans-unit.target: The specified inputStream is .

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter.Binder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter.Binder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> </xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder"></xref> that performs type lookups during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder"> </xref> som utfører typen oppslag under deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> </xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> used for serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>brukes for serialisering og deserialisering.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> </xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the data to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som inneholder dataene deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: The top object of the deserialized graph.
trans-unit.target: Øverste objektet av deserialisert diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> </xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The stream where the formatter puts the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten der formateringen setter de serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: This stream can reference a variety of backing stores (such as files, network, memory, and so on).
trans-unit.target: Denne dataflyten kan referere til en rekke sikkerhetskopiering butikker (for eksempel filer, nettverk, minne og så videre).

trans-unit.source: The object, or root of the object graph, to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Objektet eller roten for å serialisere diagrammet objektet.

trans-unit.source: All child objects of this root object are automatically serialized.
trans-unit.target: Alle underordnede objekter av denne rotobjekt er automatisk serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> </xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"></xref> used by this formatter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"> </xref> brukes av dette formatering.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter> </xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>

trans-unit.source: A string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter"></xref> deserializes into an initialized object.
trans-unit.target: En streng som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter"> </xref> deserializes til et initialisert objekt.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the state of an ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer statusen for en ASP.NET-serverkontroll.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter.Serialize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter> </xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the view state of the Web server control to serialize to string form.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som representerer visningsstatusen kontrollens for Web-server til å serialisere streng skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a Web server control's view state.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer en Web serverkontroll visningsstatusen.
